productRequests.title: Add tags for solutions
productRequests.details: Easier to search for solutions based on a specific stack.

productRequests.title: Add a dark theme option
productRequests.details: It would help people with light sensitivities and who prefer dark mode.

productRequests.title: Q&A within the challenge hubs
productRequests.details: Challenge-specific Q&A would make for easy reference.

productRequests.title: Add image/video upload to feedback
productRequests.details: Images and screencasts can enhance comments on solutions.

productRequests.title: Ability to follow others
productRequests.details: Stay updated on comments and solutions other people post.

productRequests.title: Preview images not loading
productRequests.details: Challenge preview images are missing when you apply a filter.

productRequests.title: More comprehensive reports
productRequests.details: It would be great to see a more detailed breakdown of solutions.

productRequests.title: Learning paths
productRequests.details: Sequenced projects for different goals to help people improve.

productRequests.title: One-click portfolio generation
productRequests.details: Add ability to create professional looking portfolio from profile.

productRequests.title: Bookmark challenges
productRequests.details: Be able to bookmark challenges to take later on.

productRequests.title: Animated solution screenshots
productRequests.details: Screenshots of solutions with animations don’t display correctly.

productRequests.title: Add micro-interactions
productRequests.details: Small animations at specific points can add delight.
